title: Patcher is Stuck at 33%
body:
I have been trying to play the game unsuccessfully for the past 4 days. I don't know what changed but every since then my patcher has been stuck at 33% / telling me update failed. Last night it made it to 99% so i left it on overnight with no success. It never made it past, i received a "update failed" message. I have looked all over the boards/forums and found 101 ways to fix it, but none have worked. I don't know what to do at this point so i figured I would start my own discussion. Please suggest ideas, I will try and reply if it worked or not as the suggestions come in. I have already tried to repair my patcher with no success that also got stuck at 33%

Please "up-vote" it so I can find a way as soon as possible and possibly help others who share the same problem.

replies.body:
Getting the "Update Failed" message at both 99% and at 33% all seem to point some sort of connection between with our Patcher Servers.  Essentially, something is blocking the connection between those servers and your computer, so your patcher can't get all the required files.  I know you said you've tried 101 different ways to fix it, but I want to confirm that you have completed all of the steps in our [Connection Issues Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664).  The steps there are the most common solutions that should resolve this and get you patched up.

I hope this helps!
I have tried all the listed solutions.
when i get stuck on 33 i sometimes just have to re download the game and its fixed soon after

If you tried all of the different solutions there, the next best step you can take is to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our Tech Specialists can investigate much more in-depth with you and find a solution to this issue.  If you do submit a ticket, make sure to provide the following as well:

1) [Network Analysis](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq1)

2) [Network Information Log](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq4)

3) [Process List](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq3)
